column4: I need some help when somebody's got a second, it's in regards to me screwing up a dual-boot... grub wouldn't let me boot into XP (said something about NTLDR) so I threw in my XP disk and did a fixmbr, now when I boot it says "cannot find OS"
do you have a linux boot disc of any kind?
ok, boot that, use it to boot the installed ubuntu [i think there's an option for that... not sure, i don't ahve a 9.04 disc handy] and then run the grub installer
you *can* do it from the cd, but the cd might not know all the proper options, the installed system should
